医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
MRI 扫描显示出通过预测心力衰竭风险来取代侵入性心脏测试的潜力核磁共振扫描可以取代侵入性心脏测试，因为新的研究表明，它们可以可靠地估计心脏内的压力，以预测患者是否会出现心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/MRI-scans-show-pottial-to-replace-侵袭性-heart-tests-by-predicting-heart-failure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/MRI-scans-show-pottial-to-replace- Invasive-heart-tests-by-predicting-heart-failure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40f7a2e9-73d0-48f3-a975-76added909bd Mon, 12 Aug 2024 10:02:00 -0400 MRI scans show potential to replace invasive heart tests by predicting heart failure risk
新研究强调男性癌症负担日益增加以及全球健康公平的迫切需要在对男性 30 种癌症类型的分析中，研究人员发现，按年龄和国家经济状况划分的癌症病例和死亡人数存在巨大差异，预计到 2050 年，这种差异将进一步扩大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-research-highlights-forming-cancer-burden-for-men-and-urgent-need-for-global-health-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-research-highlights-forming-cancer-burden-for-men-and-urgent-need-for-global-health-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2ccea8d-f18c-4b4b-9704-c82b944b19f3 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 09:54:45 -0400 New research highlights growing cancer burden for men and urgent need for global health equity
心脏肉瘤诊断和治疗的关键见解宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。心脏肉瘤以其罕见性和侵袭性为特征，给诊断和治疗带来了巨大的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Key-insights-on-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-cardiac-sarcomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Key-insights-on-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-cardiac-sarcomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b6db0de-3279-4577-8d5b-58ffb3f61967 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 09:38:00 -0400 Key insights on diagnosis and treatment of cardiac sarcomas
研究显示青少年糖消费量下降，但水平仍高于世卫组织指导方针高糖饮食被视为肥胖和慢性病的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-shows-decline-in-sugar-conspiration-among-youth-but-levels-remain-above-WHO-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-shows-decline-in-sugar-conspiration-among-youth-but-levels-remain-above-WHO-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6cf8b9c-7b4f-4307-88a3-881cbab19a89 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 09:05:43 -0400 Study shows decline in sugar consumption among youth but levels remain above WHO guidelines
2 型糖尿病会阻碍 β-淀粉样蛋白的清除，可能会增加患阿尔茨海默病的风险2 型糖尿病患者患阿尔茨海默病和其他不良认知健康问题的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Type-2-diabetes-hinders-beta-amyloid-clearance-and-may-elevate-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Type-2-diabetes-hinders-beta-amyloid-clearance-and-may-elevate-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=144aecc2-c675-47f2-a7a4-fea6b981f996 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 08:54:23 -0400 Type 2 diabetes hinders beta-amyloid clearance and may elevate Alzheimer's risk
KERI 的经颅随机噪声刺激显示出治疗代谢综合征的希望KERI电子医疗设备研究部人类护理电子医疗设备研究中心的Ki-young Shin博士领导的团队进行的用于治疗和管理代谢综合征的神经调节技术的研发工作正在顺利进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/KERIs-transcranial-random-noise-stimulation-shows-promise-for-metabolic-syndrome-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/KERIs-transcranial-random-noise-stimulation-shows-promise-for-metabolic-syndrome-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9492a8f5-69fd-4ee1-af04-439e9919d056 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 08:48:53 -0400 KERI's transcranial random noise stimulation shows promise for metabolic syndrome treatment
新研究将脑细胞结构与衰老和痴呆症的记忆丧失联系起来研究人员评估了颞叶皮质中的树突棘头部直径是否比突触数量更能预测老年人的情景记忆表现，从而解释了β淀粉样斑块、神经原纤维缠结和性别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-study-links-brain-cell-structs-to-memory-loss-in-aging-and-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-study-links-brain-cell-structs-to-memory-loss-in-aging-and-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fb6276c-e7f9-4051-b50c-9bb4e44605c5 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 07:44:00 -0400 New study links brain cell structures to memory loss in aging and dementia
气味可以帮助抵抗感染吗？线虫研究表明如此加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员使用线虫模型秀丽隐杆线虫来确定嗅觉神经系统是否可以非自主地控制线粒体未折叠蛋白响应以应对细胞应激。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Can-odors-help-fight-infection-Nematode-research-suggests-so.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Can-odors-help-fight-infection-Nematode-research-suggests-so.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdccb0be-7d04-4926-a507-1c8c3057d3b2 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 06:57:00 -0400 Can odors help fight infection? Nematode research suggests so
